messages.subject: New never before seen pics!!
messages.msgSnippet: The scanner is FINALLY working! Check Shinsengumi and Related People under Photos for some never before seen photos of familiar faces-- like a new picture
messages.messageBody:
The scanner is FINALLY working! Check "Shinsengumi and Related People"
under "Photos" for some never before seen photos of familiar faces--
like a new picture of Matsudaira Katamori, and an alternate picture of
Tokugawa Mikako!

All photos in this particular upload are from "Tokugawa Yoshinobu", by
Takano Kiyoshi-sensei.

--M.
